name: Hawksworth's Hotel Georgia
description: Imagine a silkier Ramos Gin Fizz that replaces the heavy cream with orgeat, a nutty almond syrup. Brad grates nutmeg on top to add a sweet, earthy aroma.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine egg white, gin, orgeat, lemon juice, and orange blossom water in a shaker and shake vigorously for 15 seconds with no ice. Add ice to shaker and continue shaking vigorously for 20 seconds.
Strain the mixture through a fine mesh strainer into a chilled coupe glass. Grate some fresh nutmeg onto the surface of the drink and serve.
